Issue.creator: clydedacruz
Issue.summary: "Create chain" operation fails on user dashboard
Issue.environment: MODE=dev make start # make build-user-dashbaord-js At this point both the dashboards are started up. >
Issue.description: MODE=dev make start # make build-user-dashbaord-js At this point both the dashboards are started up. After both the dashboards start up, a worker is added on operator dashboard h2. Issue I'm logged in as admin on the user dashboard. I then proceed to create a chain (see below screenshot) !image-2019-01-25-15-33-07-828.png|width=537,height=297! This step gives the following error notification !image-2019-01-25-15-35-54-786.png! *The request payload that ges to the API is* {"name":"newchain1","type":"fabric-1.0","size":4} *This results in a 400 (bad request)* *response body :* \{"success":false} h2. Logs (can be seen when I do "make logs") !image-2019-01-25-15-59-24-615.png! >
